title: WWE Clash in Paris 2025
overview: WWE Clash in Paris was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) and live-streaming event produced by the American company WWE. It was the third Clash event, truncated from the previous "Clash at the Castle" name used in 2022 and 2024. The event took place on Sunday, August 31, 2025, at the Paris La Défense Arena in La Défense, Nanterre, France, marking WWE's second PPV and livestreaming event held in France after Backlash France in May 2024, and the first in the Paris metropolitan area. It was held for wrestlers from the promotion's Raw and SmackDown brand divisions.
